text: Exactly. I won’t be content until youth are fully vaccinated. Government talk of ⬇️ restrictions *in a few weeks* when more adults are vaccinated frightens me. (Eg Min. Merriman today)  We need to protect those under 18! Not over till it’s over. #youth #covid19  #Vaccine #skpoli https://t.co/dacAEY7yPz
